parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the vehicle to lose stopping power, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
the brakes make a grinding noise
the front end vibrates when braking
the vehicle is unable to stop when traveling at slow speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pad Wear and Premature Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The undersized brakes and excessive heat exposure can cause the brake pads to wear out prematurely, leading to reduced stopping power and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pads need to be replaced frequently (every 9
000 miles)
the brakes make a grinding noise
the front end vibrates when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle's braking system may not be sufficient to stop the vehicle when fully loaded, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
the brakes make a grinding noise
the front end vibrates when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delamination and failure of Firestone tires can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and strandings, potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Tire delamination
tire blowout
bubble formation on the side of the tire
tire separation
loss of vehicle control
difficulty steering
and vehicle vibration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Firestone's refusal to honor warranties can leave customers stranded and financially burdened, potentially exacerbating the risks associated with tire failure.
symptoms: Firestone's refusal to inspect or replace defective tires
denial of warranty claims
and demands for customers to pay for tire return or inspection.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive headlight glare can cause temporary blindness to oncoming traffic, increasing the risk of accidents and potentially leading to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Headlights are blinding to other vehicles
headlights have been adjusted numerous times
headlights have been replaced multiple times.
